page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A D.J.
page.content: Robin Galloway, Radio DJ, Northsound. Interviewing him changed our views on a DJ's lifestyle. His is an intense schedule; he rises at 7.00 am, and starts work at 8.45. He is allowed 4 two minute breaks per hour. The playing of each disc is accompanied by the completion of a detailed music return. Robin lives with his girlfriend and doesn't drive. The myth of fast cars and women doesn't apply here! He became a DJ because of his love of music. His favourite artist is David Bowie. Robin enjoys working with Northsound (local commercial radio). He never works from scripts and has made no blunders on the air. Loneliness is not a factor as he's communicating constantly. He is well paid but not to plug particular artists. He complains only of having no time to play his favourite sports.
